attachments.displayName:
Show Your Desktop Friday - Shiny Edition

I decided to combine "Desktop Friday" together with "Firefly Friday" this week.  Like last time I shared, I've included a link to the wallpaper and to my .conkyrc config for those who are interested in them.  If you do happen to snag my conky config I'd appreciate if you'd leave a comment that you did.  Always nice to know when people check it out.

Hardware: AMD 2.9Ghz Quad Core / 8GB DDR3-1600
Software: LinuxMint 15 XFCE 64bit
Desktop: XFCE / Orta Theme / Faenza Icons / Conky
Wallpaper:  http://goo.gl/3TGDlE
Conky Config:  http://goo.gl/xztaUf 

#ShowYourDesktopFriday #ShowYourLinuxDesktopFriday 
#FireflyFriday   #Firefly   #Serenity   #Shiny
